div.p: FHISD Remote Learning Plan – Although our schools and buildings remain closed due to the Coronavirus Pandemic, we are committed to continue to provide the quality education you have come to expect from FHISD. Google Classroom is a free collaboration tool for teachers and students. Teachers can create an online classroom, invite students to the class then create and distribute assignments. Within the Google Classroom students and teachers can have conversations about the assignments and teachers can track the student's progress.

h2.div: If you need any assistance, feel free to contact us.

div.p: Director of Technology: Tomas Chavez tchavez@fhisd.net (915) 208-2387
Technology Support Specialist: Favio L. Melendez fmelendez@fhisd.net (915) 333-0147
